project.name: EdgeCommons

params.description: Class of the container script-Tag (default: data)

Module: Preload

Setup Preloader and call callback.
Callback will be called when Preloader is ready
or directly if Preloader already exists

Module: Sound
Bridge to the great framework by Grant Skinner "CreateJS"
Play sound
Stop sound
Open a spotlight overlay by passing in a configuration object
classitems.name: open

params.name: documentContext
params.description: The parent context for the spotlight overlay (e.g. window.document or window.parent.document)

return.description: returns true whenever the opening of the spotlight overlay was successfull otherwise false

classitems.description:
Close an existing spotlight overlay  
(This function usually gets called by the internal close button)
classitems.name: close

params.name: documentContext
params.description: The parent context for the spotlight overlay (e.g. window.document or window.parent.document)
